400.description: The request data is invalid or missing required information
400.suggestion: Check the input data and try again

401.description: You need to provide valid authentication credentials to access this resource
401.suggestion: Log in again or verify your credentials

403.description: You do not have permission to access this resource
403.suggestion: Contact the administrator to gain access

404.description: The requested resource does not exist on the server
404.suggestion: Check the URL or contact the administrator

500.description: An error occurred on the server, unable to process the request
500.suggestion: Try again later or contact the support team
